job.title: Junior Software Engineer
job.description: Founded in 2020 by former members of the Essential Products team in Silicon Valley, OSOM is a hardware/software technology startup that prioritizes privacy. OSOM (pronounced awe-some) stands for “Out of Sight, Out of Mind.” As our mission states, we are creating products that give people access to the world without giving the world access to them. We are in stealth mode now, but excited to introduce a future where our users decide how and when to share their personal information.  At OSOM, we believe privacy is a right, not a luxury or a privilege. We want to enable every individual to own their privacy. We are looking for passionate people to help us build this future. https://www.cnet.com/tech/mobile/android-and-iphones-are-all-about-privacy-now-but-startup-osom-thinks-it-can-do-better/  https://www.techradar.com/news/there-wont-be-an-essential-phone-2-but-ex-employees-may-make-a-spiritual-successor  https://www.androidpolice.com/2020/09/04/former-essential-staff-have-started-a-new-company-called-osom-products/  We are looking for a Junior Software Engineer to design, develop and test OSOM software. What We’re Looking For: How You’ll Stand Out: Perks You’ll Receive: At OSOM, we are committed to providing an environment fundamentally built on mutual respect; where employment opportunities are available to all applicants and employees without regard to race, color, religion, sex, pregnancy, nationality, age, disability, marital status, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, genetic information (including characteristics and testing), military service and veteran status, and any other characteristic protected by applicable law. OSOM believes that diversity and inclusion among our team is critical to our success as a company.  OSOM is requiring all employees to be vaccinated against COVID-19 unless the employee has a medical or religious reason not to be vaccinated.  If you need any accommodations or assistance with applying for a position, please email us at recruiting@osomprivacy.com.
